marklogic.body: 2. we wasn't on the fields stupid, go do other cultures history. you had the afro-american on the field not us. as i recall it is you white americans that are trying to be black by openning up a tanning salon in america, have tanning rubbing lotion & love to go to the beach & not hit the polluted waters but wanna lay on the sand all day tossing & turning to get a good Burn just to be black. get the fuk Off the sand because people need to walk around & play sports on the sanded beach. i noticed that it's you people all over the world trying to be black period so it goes both ways. look what your fore-fathers did to the afro-american negro women by making their new generations EUROPEAN/NEGRO'S, what happen......white girls puzzy isn't good enough anymore that your fore-fathers had to have the best black puzzy by raping what they couldn't have in america to the slaves.
